templates.description: An example Laravel application with a MySQL database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/luciddreamz/laravel-ex/blob/master/readme.md.
templates.name: laravel-mysql-example

templates.description: An example Laravel application with a PostgreSQL database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/luciddreamz/laravel-ex/blob/master/readme.md.
templates.name: laravel-pgsql-example

templates.description:
An example Laravel application with a SQLite database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/luciddreamz/laravel-ex/blob/master/readme.md.

WARNING: Any data stored will be lost upon pod destruction. Only use this template for testing.
templates.name: laravel-sqlite-example

templates.description: Memcached service. It uses memcached image from official repository at docker hub. https://hub.docker.com/r/library/memcached/
templates.name: memcached
